definitions.definition: A very light state of sleep , almost awake.
A state of ignorance or inaction .
The snooze button on an alarm clock .
labels: as used by Magnavox clock radios
definitions.label_groups: rare , as used by Magnavox clock radios

main_definition: A very light state of sleep , almost awake.
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) A state of ignorance or inaction .
( rare , as used by Magnavox clock radios ) The snooze button on an alarm clock .
